messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Kyle Chandler/Rob Lowe
messages.msgSnippet: I know we have moved on from the do-able thread, but I saw the previews tonite for Rob Lowes new series on NBC, called The Lion s Den to be aired on Sunday
messages.messageBody:
I know we have moved on from the do-able thread, but I saw the previews
tonite for Rob Lowes new series on NBC, called "The Lion's Den" to be aired on
Sunday evenings. During the previews they showed members of the the law firm the
drama will be about and tada, Kyle Chandler.

Rhonda - who when she was 14 thought no-one was as do-able as Rob Lowe, even
though she was far away from doing anyone.LOL
